title: Paterson quits as MP over lobbying row 'nightmare'
content: The Tory MP is at the centre of a bitter row after he was found to have made "egregious" rule breaches.

title: Paterson quits as MP over lobbying row 'nightmare'
content: The Tory MP is at the centre of a bitter row after he was found to have made "egregious" rule breaches.

title: MP convicted of harassment gets suspended sentence
content: A court hears Claudia Webbe made several calls to her partner's friend and threatened her with acid.

title: PM given free holiday by minister Goldsmith
content: Boris Johnson confirms he stayed at the Spanish home of Lord Goldsmith's family in October.

title: Insulate Britain blocks roads around Parliament
content: One protester said drivers have suggested the group campaigns at Parliament - "so we took that advice".

title: In full: Owen Paterson resignation statement
content: Following a row over paid lobbying, the Conservative ex-minister says he is stepping down as an MP.

title: Brexit minister in Paris for talks on fishing row
content: France has warned punitive measures are still "on the table" if a deal cannot be reached.

title: Office vandalised due to Paterson vote, MP claims
content: Peter Bone says his staff were put in danger by the incident after the vote on Wednesday.
